segments.text: I see the little girl standing there with her hand out, waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She looks so hopeful, like she’s about to get a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she knows her brother is taking a risk, but she doesn’t care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water from the sink is spreading across the floor, and no one seems to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the girl will slip on the wet floor while reaching for the cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman drying dishes is completely unaware of the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel bad for the kids because they might get in trouble if they get caught.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar is almost empty, and the boy is still trying to grab more.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the girl is going to be disappointed if he drops the plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole kitchen is a mess, and no one is doing anything about it.
segments.speaker: PAR
